Brothers and Sisters since the announcement of the President of the State in 2016 # reading year in the UAE and we receive a lot of ideas and opinions to achieve this goal
We want a national brainstorm by marking the year of reading for the most important ideas through which reading can be rooted in a socially popular society in our society

We will discuss all the ideas that will come through the marking of the year of reading .. And we will hold a retreat to the top 100 national personalities involved to discuss these ideas .. We called the 100 percent

Our goal is to create a long-term strategy to make reading a part of the culture, identity and life of our generations, and we expect every lover of the UAE to contribute even an idea in the # year of reading
